problem: Develop a Windows application (Screenshare with Gemini 2.5 Pro V1.0) using C# (pending confirmation) that captures screen and microphone, sends data to Gemini 2.5 Pro, provides GUI controls based on an image, and includes logging.
context: Target Platform: Windows. Language: C# preferred. Key Components: GUI, Screen Capture, Audio Capture, Gemini API Integration, Logging, Threading. Potential Challenge: Real-time streaming support in Gemini API.
